fulltext: oai:www.clarin.si:11356/1053;2018-08-03T18:45:16Z;hdl_11356_1023;hdl_11356_1024;IMP corpus n-grams 1.0;Dobrovoljc, Kaja;n-grams;wordlist;multiword expressions;historical language;This is a collection of n-grams extracted from the IMP corpus of historical Slovene (http://hdl.handle.net/11356/1031). name: 56177d8e-2c3d-5a34-b8fe-913ac445fec4
notes: This is a collection of n-grams extracted from the IMP corpus of historical Slovene (http://hdl.handle.net/11356/1031). In addition to the separate lists of n-grams for tokens and their attributes (modernised form, morphosyntacic tag, lemma), an adjusted frequency list with statistical substring reduction has also been added (as described in O'Donnell 2011). Only n-grams within sentences have been counted.
title: IMP corpus n-grams 1.0
